greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Constant term in the expansion of (-1 + Product_{k=1..n} (1 + x_k + 1/x_k))^n.
comment: Also number of n-step closed walks (from origin to origin) in n-dimensional lattice, using steps (t_1,t_2, ... ,t_n) (t_k = -1, 1 or 0 for 1 <= k <= n) except for (0,0, ... ,0) (t_k = 0 for 1 <= k <= n).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..47
mathematica: Table[Sum[(-1)^(n-k) * Binomial[n, k] * Sum[Binomial[k, 2*j]*Binomial[2*j, j], {j, 0, k}]^n, {k, 0, n}], {n, 0, 12}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 30 2019 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Oct 29 2019
